required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Influence of Kinesiology Taping Application on Severity of Signs and Symptoms in Breast Engorgement.
clinical_study.official_title: Influence of Kinesiology Taping Application on Severity of Signs and Symptoms in Breast Engorgement at Early Lactation Stage.

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the research is to asses the efficacy of kinesiology taping application in breast engorgement in early postpartum stage.
Kinesiology application will be performed by women's health physiotherapist. Patient's perceived improvement and milk outflow following application will be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Visual Analogue Scale (VAS) change from baseline till 24 hours after intervention
primary_outcome.time_frame: assessment at the baseline 24 hours after intervention
primary_outcome.description: Pain assesment by Visual Analogue Scale (VAS scale), range 0-10, higher numbers represents worse outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: Human milk outflow change from baseline till 24 hours after intervention
primary_outcome.time_frame: assessment at the baseline and 24 hours after intervention
primary_outcome.description: Assesment of milk outflow based on infant body mass increase
assesment of breast engorgement, range 1-6, higher values represent worse outcomes
assessment of improvement of signs and symptoms of breast engorgement range 1-5, higher values represent worse outcomes
assessment of mother's attitude to breastfeeding

secondary_outcome.measure: Visual Analogue Scale (VAS) change from baseline till 3 hours after intervention
secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessment at the baseline 3 hours after intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Pain assesment by Visual Analogue Scale (VAS scale), range from 0-10, higher numbers represents worse outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Human milk outflow change from baseline till 3 hours after intervention
secondary_outcome.time_frame: assessment at the baseline and 3 hours after intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Assesment of milk outflow based on infant body mass increase
assessment of improvement of signs and symptoms of breast engorgement, range 1-5, higher values represent worse outcomes

arm_group.arm_group_label: Standard care and Kinesiology taping Group
arm_group.description: Application of elastic cotton strip with an acrylic adhesive that is used with the intent of treating pain and disability from athletic injuries and a variety of other physical disorders.
Assistance in baby feeding, manual of device-assisted (lactator) milk expression, cold compress, ibuprofen, gentle breast massage, breathing and shoulder girdle exercise.

intervention.description: Application of elastic cotton strip with an acrylic adhesive that is used with the intent of treating pain and disability from athletic injuries and a variety of other physical disorders
intervention.arm_group_label: Standard care and Kinesiology taping Group

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- cesarian section or vaginal delivery
- delivery between 37 and 41 gestational week
- signs and symptoms of breast engorgement (significant increase of breast between 2nd and 10th day postpartum, pain, obstructed milk outflow)
- VAS 4 and more
- volume of milk outflow less than 20ml
- 6 point self-rated engorgement scale between 3 and 6
Exclusion Criteria:
- age less than 18 and more than 45
- patients after extensive surgical breast intervention or having breast implants
- allergy to kinesiology taping

facility.name: Żelazna Medical Centre, St. Sophia Hospital
